title: Course for Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Collaborative Role-Play Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Team-based role-assigned mathematical problem-solving training in smartphone-based web simulation environments, applied to real-world workplace scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can perform optimal resource allocation calculations under given budget constraints with 80% accuracy through team collaboration
Learners can develop a decision-making model incorporating inventory management formulas that reflect unpredictable variables (e.g., emergency orders) in a simulation environment within 72 hours
Learners can propose mathematical problem-solving improvements reflecting errors from role-playing activities, incorporating peer feedback, at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
